reviews.review:
at 1,200 hours the game becomes more toxic and the flaws become more and more hard to ignore. I only play because some friends have fun gaming together, but this game has no real fun left.   The game has no mechanic to penalize all the toxic behavior and it becomes tiresome to deal with non stop toxic B.S.    I don't say this ligtly, but the worst online community.  On top of that, a buggy game, a horrific grind system.  Fun can be found, but you have to enjoy being shit on most of the time to hope for that 1 or 2 fun games inbweeen tons of very unfun games. 


Now at almost 1,000 hours I would still say the game is still mostly fun, but still very much flawed.  It is fun to play with friends, but it is poorly balanced, has a surprising amount of bugs, toxic community and the to unlock all the perks, get ready to grind, grind grind.   I still keep this as a positive review, but honestly, its one more poor update from going to a negative review.   
///

review at 150ish hours
Game is mostly Good. It is fun, but flawed.  matchmaking is very poor, and that can be a pain in the ass.   The dynamic of being chased by a killer or hunting a survivor is a LOT of fun.    The game gets a get unbalanced when survivors play in  group in a chat program like discord, because no skill in the game can manage to handle good communcation. 


I play both killer and survivor, and have fun with both, but this game is tilted toward survivor, especially at higher ranks

殺人鬼でマッチングを開始すると１０秒以内にマッチングする神ゲーです。
上手な生存者はほぼおらず、お友達同士でワイワイしてるだけなのでかき乱してやりましょう。
生存側に負傷状態で有利になるパークが多いため、ワンパンできる殺人鬼・パークをお勧めします。
ヒルビリーに"呪術：貪られる希望"と"選択は君次第だ"つけときゃ最低３人吊れるので、全然勝てない人はお試しください。どうせ発電機は動きませんが"呪術：破滅"もあるとゲーム終了時に発電機修理数が0~1になります。

ブライト実装により、パーク"呪術：不死"を付けることでゲームが壊れます。（デボアのトークンはリセットされます。）

Want to play a game where you go hunting or are getting hunted? Then here's the game for you! Dead By Daylight is a game where 4 players (survivors) are placed in a map against another player (hunter). 
The hunter/killer entire premise is to hunt down the survivors and sacrifice them to the entity by placing them on hooks. The survivors must hide and run from the killer and are tasked with repairing generators all around the map, that once a certain amount of them have been fixed, they will trigger the gates, where survivors need to open to finally escape and win.

The game does give you a good amount of tools for both teams, by giving perks, items, and offerings (extra items that get immediately consumed once the game starts and can shift how the game goes. ) Which also jumps into the next part! No game ever feels the same! With a good variety of perks, the gameplay can vary in many different ways! From harder to hunt survivors, to hexes that make the game a hell for survivors!

In the end, i recommend if you are into spooks and 4v1 type games! May your luck ever shift in your favor and happy hunting!

Dead by Daylight could be an awesome game. Why is it not? Because of three main points

- Balancing: The Character Abilities (Perks and Offerings) are heavily scewed towards survivors, who have a crutch for practically every weakness any game system gives them. Meanwhile killers do each have significant weaknesses that can rarely be overcome - this is good design in and of itself, but since survivors get much more help here, it is a problem.

- Optimisation: The game is barely optimised at all. If you don't have a mid-tier to high-tier gaming PC, don't buy it because you will not be able to play, even with graphic settings (which consist of an ominous "quality" dropdown menu and a resolution setting, nothing else!) toned down. For reference: On my laptop with a GeForce 940MX (nothing special but can run LoL and The Long Dark with decent and Skyrim with some mods and low-mid settings), the game is constantly at 100% - in the start menu! Getting into game takes ages and results in a stuttering, lagging, abysmal experience.

- Bugs: The Dev Team keep pushing new content, causing 1-2 gamebreaking bugs per major patch on average. And these bugs typically persist for weeks to months. This results in an unsatisfying experience even if you dont care about balance and your PC is strong enough to run it.

The design, concepts and core gameplay of DBD are great, and it's fun to play SWF with your buddies, but anything else, especially trying to seriously play killer, is nothing short of a pain in the ass.

Gra w której naprawiasz 5 generatorów żeby przetrwać lub grasz zabójcą żeby zabić 4 ocalałych. Sporo morderców jak i uciekających (z czasem będzie jeszcze więcej) którzy mają swoje unikalne umiejętności. Dużo map, przedmiotów dla uciekających które pomogą tobie w rozgrywce oraz świetny system rang. Super się gra ze znajomymi, można grać przez wiele godzin.

Granie uciekającym:
-Przyjemnie się naprawia generatory.
-Super gra się ze znajomymi.
-Czasami można się przestraszyć mordercy.
-Klimatyczna i mroczna rozgrywka.
-Dobrać dobre umiejętności do postaci którą gramy.

Granie Mordercą:
-Często wkurzająca (zależy od rangi).
-satysfakcja z zabicia wszystkich uciekających na mapie.
-Trzeba wykazać się umiejętnościami.
-Dobrać dobre umiejętności do mordercy którym gramy.

                                            ----------!Polecam!----------




A game where you repair 5 generators to survive or you play a killer to kill 4 survivors. A lot of murderers and runaways (there will be even more with time) who have their own unique skills. Lots of maps, items for escapees to help you in the game and a great rank system. It's great to play with friends, you can play for hours.

Playing the Escape:
- Generators are nice to repair.
-Super to play with your friends.
-Sometimes you get scared by a murderer.
-Climatic and dark gameplay.
-Choose good skills for the character we play.

Playing the Murderer:
-Often annoying (depends on rank).
-satisfaction with killing everyone escaping on the map.
-You have to show your skills.
-Choose good skills for the murderer we play.

                                             ----------! I recommend! ----------

Super fun and addictive horror game!  I tried it out one free weekend and never looked back.  I have 1100 hours as survivor and killer.  The game brings many iconic horror genre characters together in one game which is a dream come true for any horror movie buff.  The community can be a bit salty so sometimes I find turning off the post game chat improves my mood during my gaming session.  Expect to die a lot as survivor and don't expect to kill everyone as killer.  But know you will have a lot of fun along the way!
DBD is a very beautiful game!!

Балансировать ассиметричный мультиплеер сложно. И первое что стоит запомнить начиная играть в эту игру - она максимально контр-интуитивна. Прийдётся множество раз биться головой о грабли чтобы понять как работают базовые механики.
Играя выжившим, не один раз убийца будет бить воздух, а попадать по вам. И пройдёт много времени пока вы поймёте, какой удар по воздуху будет попадать, а какой пройдёт мимо. Но если проявить терпение и упорство, на высоких рангах вы будете играть против одного выжившего в команде из четырёх маньяков.
Если вы собираетесь играть маньяком - соболезную. Нужное иметь серьёзную стрессоустойчивость чтобы пережить весь поток ненависти и/или издевательств от токсичных игроков, которых тут, увы, навалом.
В целом, стоит своих денег...
